name: Shade and Stone
description:
What is the game

Shade and Stone is a 3D top-down angled perspective stealth game set in a dim and gloomy ruin where the player must make it to a valuable talisman by distracting, sneaking and utilising special tools allowing the player to turn invisible and transform into a rat to avoid the hulking ancient golem protecting it!

Shade and Stone is a stealth game created as a student project by students at The Academy of Interactive Entertainment in Australia. 

The game is currently in production with devlogs to be sent out weekly!

!*Update*! We now have a playable build! After playing please take time to fill out this short feedback form.
